title: Mac OS 7.6 Installation Frustration (Macintosh TV) -  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Mac OS 7.6 Installation Frustration (Macintosh TV) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: The Macintosh TV is in need of a Mac OS 7.6 software upgrade! Krazy Ken will soon find out how a simple software update can doom mankind (or at least break is computer).  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #89 - Mac OS 7.6 Installation Frustration (Macintosh TV)  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
